company_info.name: Skyline Residences
company_info.about: Skyline Residences is a trusted name in real estate with 15 years of excellence in delivering premium residential projects across Noida.

payment_plans: Construction Linked Plan (CLP) - Pay as construction progresses
Down Payment Plan - 20% down, rest on possession
Flexi Payment Plan - Customized based on customer needs
pricing_info.home_loan_assistance: Yes, we have tie-ups with leading banks like HDFC, ICICI, SBI, and Axis Bank. Our team assists with documentation and approval process.
pricing_info.special_offers: Limited period offer: Waiver on stamp duty and registration charges for bookings done this month.
pricing_info.gst: GST as applicable (currently 5% for under-construction properties)

faqs.question: Is the project RERA approved?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our projects are RERA certified. Skyline Heights has RERA number UPRERAPRJ12345 and Skyline Villas has UPRERAPRJ67890.

faqs.question: How can I book a site visit?
faqs.answer: You can book a site visit by calling us at +91-9876543210 or emailing at info@skylineresidences.com. Our team will schedule a convenient time for you. Site visits are available Monday to Saturday, 10 AM to 6 PM.

faqs.question: What is the booking amount?
faqs.answer: The booking amount is ₹2 Lakhs which is refundable. This amount will be adjusted against the total property cost.

faqs.question: Do you provide home loan assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have partnerships with leading banks including HDFC, ICICI, SBI, and Axis Bank. Our team will help you with documentation and the entire loan approval process.

faqs.question: When will I get possession?
faqs.answer: Skyline Heights possession is scheduled for December 2025, and Skyline Villas for June 2026. We have a track record of timely deliveries.

faqs.question: What documents do I need for booking?
faqs.answer: You'll need PAN Card, Aadhar Card, Address Proof, and a Cancelled Cheque. For home loan, income proof will also be required.

faqs.question: What is the price range for 2BHK apartments?
faqs.answer: 2BHK apartments in Skyline Heights are priced between ₹55 Lakhs to ₹68 Lakhs, with sizes ranging from 1150 to 1250 sq.ft.

faqs.question: What is the price range for 3BHK?
faqs.answer: 3BHK apartments in Skyline Heights range from ₹85 Lakhs to ₹1.05 Crores. For villas, 3BHK is priced between ₹1.2 Crores to ₹1.6 Crores.

faqs.question: What amenities are available?
faqs.answer: We offer swimming pool, gymnasium, kids play area, 24x7 security, power backup, covered parking, landscaped gardens, jogging track, and more. Villas also have additional premium amenities like clubhouse and tennis court.

faqs.question: Where are the projects located?
faqs.answer: Skyline Heights is located in Sector 137 on Noida Expressway, walking distance from metro. Skyline Villas is in Sector 150, Noida, a premium gated community.

faqs.question: What are the payment plans available?
faqs.answer: We offer Construction Linked Plan (CLP), Down Payment Plan (20% down), and Flexi Payment Plan which can be customized based on your needs.

faqs.question: Are there any special offers?
faqs.answer: Yes! Currently we're offering a waiver on stamp duty and registration charges for bookings made this month. This is a limited period offer.

contact_info.office_address: Skyline Residences Head Office, Plot No. 45, Sector 62, Noida - 201309
contact_info.working_hours: Monday to Saturday: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM (Sunday closed)
contact_info.site_visit_booking: Call or email to schedule. Free pick-up and drop facility available from Noida metro stations.
